Name: Apprentice
Description: You are capable of learning additional spells.

Name: Arcanum
Description: Gain maximum sanctity. Master this ability to unlock the Philosopher archetype.

Name: Backstab
Description: You are more likely to attack first in combat.

Name: Bash
Description: (BROKEN)You deal more damage with blunt weapons.

Name: Blackhearted
Description: (BROKEN)Lose virtue faster.

Name: Charmer
Description: (BROKEN)You are more likely to succeed when choosing charm dialogues.

Name: Discipline
Description: Gain devotion faster. Master this ability to unlock the Ascetic archetype.

Name: Haggler
Description: Prices at shops are cheaper.

Name: MartialArts
Description: You deal more damage in combat.

Name: Meditation
Description: Regenerate sanctity per day.

Name: Poet
Description: Gain renown faster. Master this ability to unlock the Opportunist archetype.

Name: Relentless
Description: Gain maximum health. Master this ability to unlock the Brute archetype.

Name: Scholar
Description: Gain experience faster.

Name: Skinner
Description: (BROKEN)You have a chance of obtaining a usable fur after kiling a beast.

Name: Strider
Description: (BROKEN)Traveling on the map requires less endurance.

Name: Student
Description: (BROKEN)You are capable of learning additional spells.

Name: Traveler
Description: Reveal more of the map when exploring new places. Master this ability to unlock the Survivalist archetype.

Name: Trickster
Description: Become harder to detect when performing stealthy activities. Master this ability to unlock the Scoundrel archetype.

Name: Vigilance
Description: (BROKEN)You are less likely to be ambushed.

Name: FameBombTest
Description: Spend 2 sanctity to gain instant fame with this silly test spell.

Name: VirtueBombTest
Description: Spend 1 endurance to gain instant virtue with this silly spell for testing purposes.

Description: Irrelevant

Description: Irrelevant

Description: Irrelevant

Description: Irrelevant

Description: Irrelevant

Name: PoisonedBlades
Description: Successful attacks apply a poison to the enemy

Name: PoisonMastery
Description: Your poisons last an additional round

Name: VampiricAura
Description: You steal life per hit

Name: Lifeleech
Description: You steal life based on how much damage you deal in combat

Name: FrozenBlades
Description: Gives your weapon a chance of freezing enemies attacked

Name: FrozenHeart
Description: Makes you immediately thaw out if frozen in combat
